recipes.Name: Christmas pie
recipes.Description: Combine a few key Christmas flavours here to make a pie that both children and adults will adore
recipes.Author: Mary Cadogan

recipes.Name: Simmer-&-stir Christmas
recipes.Description: An easy-to-make alternative to traditional Christmas cakes which requires no beating
recipes.Author: Mary Cadogan

recipes.Name: Christmas cupcakes
recipes.Description: These beautiful and classy little cakes make lovely gifts, and kids will enjoy decorating them too
recipes.Author: Sara Buenfeld

recipes.Name: Christmas buns
recipes.Description: Paul Hollywood's fruit rolls can be made ahead then heated up before adding a glossy glaze and citrus icing
recipes.Author: Paul Hollywood

recipes.Name: Christmas cupcakes
recipes.Description: Made these for the second time today, and I have to say they turned out great! I've got large muffin tins and the mixture made 15 muffins, will definetely make these again at christmas time and decorate festively.
recipes.Author: Barney Desmazery

recipes.Name: Christmas slaw
recipes.Description: A nutty winter salad which is superhealthy, quick to prepare and finished with a light maple syrup dressing
recipes.Author: Good Food

recipes.Name: Christmas mess
recipes.Description: Delicious and a synch to make! Have made this a couple of times as a dinner party dessert, very pretty as a winter alternative to Eton mess. The fact you use frozen fruits is great, I just used a bog standard pack of frozen mixed berries and added some home made blackberry liqueur. Like other people, I added more cinnamon. Thumbs up!
recipes.Author: Caroline Hire

recipes.Name: Christmas brownies
recipes.Description: can I made these the day before
recipes.Author: Miriam Nice

recipes.Name: Christmas cosmopolitan
recipes.Description: How many servings have you gotten using the above measures?
recipes.Author: Good Food

recipes.Name: Christmas pizza
recipes.Description: Use up leftover roast turkey and sausagemeat stuffing in this new spin on an Italian classic
recipes.Author: Katy Greenwood

recipes.Name: Christmas poussin
recipes.Description: Prepare ahead and pop in the oven when your guests arrive. Perfect if you don't want to be tied to the kitchen
recipes.Author: Barney Desmazery

recipes.Name: Mary Berry's Christmas
recipes.Description: A perfect match for cheese and cold meats, and delicious in turkey sandwiches
recipes.Author: Mary Berry

recipes.Name: Make & mature Christmas cake
recipes.Description: 25 min prep time? More like an hour.
recipes.Author: James Martin

recipes.Name: Christmas muffin mix
recipes.Description: A festive treat to give or receive
recipes.Author: Good Food

recipes.Name: Sparkling vanilla Christmas
recipes.Description: Easy to make. I did add a splash of milk though. Fun way to spend a rainy afternoon with the kids.
recipes.Author: Lesley Waters
